summary: This is an email chain from April 5, 2021, between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel, scheduling a call to discuss an issue that arose during a review of physical evidence from the Epstein case file, specifically related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email's subject and purpose is to schedule a call about an issue related to her that came up during a review of Epstein case evidence.

events.title: Review of Epstein Physical Evidence
events.description: An unspecified individual reviewed physical evidence from the Epstein case file, and an issue related to Ghislaine Maxwell was identified.

events.title: Scheduled Call on Maxwell Issue
events.description: A call was scheduled for 1:30 PM to discuss the issue concerning Ghislaine Maxwell that was found during the evidence review.

keyFacts: The document is an email scheduling a call among U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.
The call's purpose was to discuss an issue discovered during a review of physical evidence from the Jeffrey Epstein case file on the prior Friday (April 2, 2021).
The email indicates ongoing investigative or prosecutorial activity related to the Epstein case and Ghislaine Maxwell as of April 2021.
The senders and recipients are redacted, indicated by placeholders like '(USANYS)'.
